International Linguistics Olympiad

Keeping up with the IOLs #ioling

This years event will take place in Dublin, Ireland. The main organiser is ADAPT research centre. If you want to follow the event, do check out the following sites:


Dublin's Ha'penny Bridge. Photo: Getty.
IOL 2017
  • Website
  • Facebook
  • Twitter
Hashtags
If you post about IOL online, please use the following hashtags. That way we can all find and share content together :)! 
  • #ioling 
  • #iol2017
IOL (general, all years)
While there are year-specific pages, there are also general accounts for IOL all year round here:
